title: Product Strategy Discussion
raw_md: We discussed the Q1 roadmap and prioritized features based on user feedback. Key decisions: focus on performance improvements and mobile experience.
enhanced_md:
## Key Decisions
- Prioritize performance improvements
- Focus on mobile experience
- Defer non-critical features to Q2

## Action Items
- Schedule follow-up with engineering team
- Draft requirements document
- Set up user testing sessions

title: Engineering Retrospective
raw_md: Team reflected on the last sprint. Identified bottlenecks in the code review process and decided to implement automated testing.
enhanced_md:
## What Went Well
- Delivered all planned features
- Good collaboration across teams
- Improved deployment process

## Areas for Improvement
- Code review turnaround time
- Test coverage
- Documentation

## Action Items
- Set up automated testing pipeline
- Schedule pairing sessions for complex features
